list_definition.definition: to say ’no’ to (an invitation etc); to refuse

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We declined his offer of a lift.

list_definition.definition: to become less strong or less good etc
a gradual lessening or worsening (of health, standards, quantity etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There has been a gradual decline in the birthrate.
